item.description:
This is a chick flick but looks good

27 Dresses

A single woman who has served as a bridesmaid a stunning twenty-seven times prepares to support her sister at the alter on number twenty-eight despite having fallen helplessly in love with her smitten sibling's handsome husband-to-be. Katherine Heigl stars in a romantic comedy scripted by The Devil Wears Prada screenwriter Aline Brosh McKenna and directed by Anna Fletcher (Step Up). ~ Jason Buchanan, All Movie Guide


The release date has been pushed back to the 18th

item.how_to_find_us: The show starts at 710 I'll be upstairs by the consession stand sitting. Please arrive around 645-650 we will enter auditorium by 655, this show will probably sell out..
